intro.p: Declares that the Controller should enable a DefaultAction method for request processing if no action can be found with the supplied name

section.title: DefaultActionAttribute()
section.p: Constructs a Castle.MonoRail.Framework.DefaultActionAttribute using DefaultAction as the default action name

section.title: DefaultActionAttribute(String action)
section.p: Constructs a Castle.MonoRail.Framework.DefaultActionAttribute using the supplied value as the default action name
